formatted_address: 2 Bukit Panjang Ring Rd, #01-17 Hawker Centre & Market, Singapore 679947
name: Spicy Pot

reviews.text:
Mala xiangguo taste good, definitely will revisit, can pay cashless!

Mala xiangguo value set ($5.50) include 3 vege and 1 meat.
Vege: we can't choose
Meat: we can choose from pork, chicken, luncheon meat, crabstick etc.

Not nice! The Mala doesn’t have the basic  taste of numbness and it’s not spicy.

The ingredients tasted like they just simply boiled it in chilli water and serve straight up on the plate.

Peanut is not crunchy too.

Overall won’t recommend this shop!

vicinity: 2 Bukit Panjang Ring Road, #01-17 Hawker Centre & Market
